item.description:

üßô Mistral AI API Integration üßô

@LangChainAI üîóü¶ú just added a package for interacting with the @MistralAI chat, streaming and embedding endpoints, all seamlessly integrated with LangChain's ecosystem.

item.description:

We've seen great interest in RAG apps on docs w/ a mixture of tables and text (financial docs, whitepapers, technical manuals).

But, this brings up a few tricky questions:
1/ Can I just stuff semi-structured docs‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1735350379901272289

item.title: ü¶úüìÉDocugami KG-RAG Template We worked with @docugami to publish a RAG template that uses their technology to create XML knowledge graphs They als...
item.description:
ü¶úüìÉDocugami KG-RAG Template

We worked with @docugami to publish a RAG template that uses their technology to create XML knowledge graphs

They also benchmarked the RAG performance with LangSmith and found it outperformed OpenAI Assistant API

Read more: https://www.docugami.com/blog/kg-rag-langchain

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇShubham Saboo
LangChain meets Google Gemini üî•

Google just launched Gemini Pro as an API for developers to use in their applications.

LangChain without any wait quickly released a new Python package to access Google's multimodal LLM -Gemini!

All you need to do to get started: `pip install‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1735182170715537663

item.title: Gemini ‚ú®is natively multimodal, but how does it stack up against GPT-4V? We put gemini-pro-vision head-to-head with the reigning champ to see how wel...
item.description:
Gemini ‚ú®is natively multimodal, but how does it stack up against GPT-4V?

We put gemini-pro-vision head-to-head with the reigning champ to see how well it could answer questions based on a multimodal slide deck.

The results?  Gemini seems to be a formidable model, matching‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1735062294223274245

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
üëæ Discord Tool for Agents üëæ

It‚Äôs been quite a few weeks for @LangChainAI ü¶úüîó JS/TS, and how fitting that our community-only import is a @discord tool in 0.0.206!

Your agents can use it to send messages and pull server info!

Ty Maanethdesilva!

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/tools/discord

item.title: Want to use Gemini models via GCP? üöÄThe LangChain x VertexAI integration is now updated to support the recent models! `pip install langchain-commun...
item.description:
Want to use Gemini models via GCP?

üöÄThe LangChain x VertexAI integration is now updated to support the recent models!

`pip install langchain-community==0.0.3`

üè¶VertexAI works natively with GCP - great for enterprise use cases!

item.title: RT WFH: pip install langchain-google-genai
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇWFH
pip install langchain-google-genai


LangChain:‚ÄÇü¶úLangChain ü§ùGemini‚ôäÔ∏è

Gemini API access is out! Access it through LangChain with our first standalone integration package:

`pip install langchain-google-genai`

We're also launching an integration guide showing how to:

üéèStream results
üñºÔ∏èUse it's multimodal capabilities‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1734982565352845428

item.title: RT Logan Anderson: Using @LangChainAI agents and @vercel 's AI package, I built a chat bot that queries a knowledge base and streams results with tool...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇLogan Anderson
Using @LangChainAI agents and @vercel 's AI package, I built a chat bot that queries a knowledge base and streams results with tool outputs. The tools respond with MDX components that are then streamed to a frontend MDX renderer.

Check out the video!

#AI #Chatbot
item.author: LangChain
